document_data.name: Starrlet
document_data.mainbody: Fist '''Starrlet''' was a member of the [[Flaming Fist]] mercenary company from the [[Baldur's Gate/Lower City|Lower City]] of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Starrlet was a [[human]] woman with soft features, sun-kissed skin, and grayish blue eyes. She wore a Fist uniform [[helmet]] that hid her gray hair, and wore a set of [[chainmail]] armor decorated with a [[tabard]] embroidered with the Flaming Fist insignia. Starrlet wielded a [[halberd]] when on duty.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Fist Starrlet was tasked with patrolling the Lower City, along [[Wendserpent Street]] and near the [[Manor Gate]], accompanied by a group of fellow Fists and a [[steel watcher]].
